title: How to Make Italian Style Potato Soup

steps.headline: Add olive oil to stock or soup pot.
Cook until the onion is translucent.
Add the uncooked slice of bacon.
Add the bouillon cube to the stock pot.
Cover and simmer over low heat 30 minutes.
Add 4 cups water to stock pot.
Cook until the pasta is tender to the tooth.
Serve with lots of Parmesan cheese.
steps.description: Use freshly grated Parmesan cheese, if available for the best flavor.

text: Add olive oil to stock or soup pot.  Add chopped carrots and onion.  Cook until the onion is translucent.  Add the uncooked slice of bacon.  Add the cubed potatoes.  Add the bouillon cube to the stock pot.  Add 1 cup water.  Add rosemary, salt and pepper.  Stir well.  Cover and simmer over low heat 30 minutes.  Add 4 cups water to stock pot.  Add the pasta.  Cook until the pasta is tender to the tooth.  Remove the bacon.  Check and correct seasonings.  Serve with lots of Parmesan cheese. Use freshly grated Parmesan cheese, if available for the best flavor. Serves 4 to 6.  Finished.
